hero.title: Prime and Peaceful Flats for Rent in Sector 55 Gurugram
description: Sector 55 Gurugram is a premium and well-established residential locality located close to Golf Course Road, known for its calm surroundings and excellent connectivity. Tenants searching for a flat for rent in Sector 55 Gurugram prefer this area because it offers quick access to Rapid Metro stations, Golf Course Road, and major corporate hubs of Gurugram. The sector provides a balanced lifestyle where convenience, greenery, and urban comfort come together seamlessly.

Flats for rent in Sector 55 Gurugram are primarily available in builder floors and select residential pockets that emphasize spacious layouts, proper ventilation, and privacy. The locality is surrounded by reputed schools, hospitals, shopping centers, local markets, parks, and daily convenience stores. With strong rental demand, mature civic infrastructure, and a peaceful residential atmosphere, Sector 55 continues to be a preferred choice for families and professionals seeking long-term and comfortable rental living in Gurugram.

faqSection.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Flats for Rent in Sector 55 Gurugram
faqSection.description: Clear and detailed answers to help tenants make informed rental decisions.

faqs.question: Is Sector 55 Gurugram a good area for renting a flat?
faqs.answer: Yes, Sector 55 is a premium and peaceful locality with excellent connectivity and strong rental demand.

faqs.question: What types of flats are available for rent in Sector 55?
faqs.answer: Tenants can find builder floor flats and select residential apartments in furnished, semi-furnished, and unfurnished options.

faqs.question: Is Sector 55 suitable for families?
faqs.answer: Yes, the area offers a safe and family-friendly environment with schools, hospitals, parks, and markets nearby.

faqs.question: How is connectivity from Sector 55 Gurugram?
faqs.answer: Sector 55 enjoys excellent connectivity via Golf Course Road, Rapid Metro stations, and major city routes.

faqs.question: Are rental flats in Sector 55 expensive?
faqs.answer: Sector 55 is considered a premium locality, but rental prices are reasonable considering location and lifestyle benefits.

faqs.question: Are furnished flats available in Sector 55?
faqs.answer: Yes, furnished and semi-furnished flats are available depending on the property and landlord preference.

faqs.question: Is parking available with rental flats?
faqs.answer: Most builder floors and residential properties offer dedicated or shared parking facilities.

faqs.question: Do working professionals prefer Sector 55?
faqs.answer: Yes, professionals prefer Sector 55 due to its proximity to Golf Course Road and corporate hubs.

faqs.question: Does Deal Acres provide verified rental listings?
faqs.answer: Yes, all listings on Deal Acres are verified to ensure authenticity and tenant trust.

faqs.question: How can I find a flat for rent in Sector 55 Gurugram?
faqs.answer: You can submit the enquiry form to receive personalized assistance from experienced rental property consultants.
